item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Friday, November 22, 2024 at 9:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Story of the two thousand stolen Playdate handhelds (48 points | 5 comments)
2. Show HN: Llama 3.2 Interpretability with Sparse Autoencoders (391 points | 42 comments)
3. Autoflow, a Graph RAG based and conversational knowledge base tool (79 points | 7 comments)
4. The Birthday Paradox Experiment (37 points | 32 comments)
5. Handling cookies is a minefield (386 points | 195 comments)
6. Bayesian Neural Networks (133 points | 27 comments)
7. The FORTH code for Chipwits is released in the game's 40th anniversary (174 points | 34 comments)
8. Mechanically strong yet metabolizable plastic breaks down in seawater (42 points | 7 comments)
9. Amazon S3 now supports the ability to append data to an object (127 points | 44 comments)
10. NeuralDEM – Real-Time Simulation of Industrial Particulate Flows (5 points | discuss)
11. Windmill hiring Senior Frontend (Svelte) Engineer in Paris ( | hide)
12. Apple will now be treated like a bank (58 points | 20 comments)
13. PHP 8.4 (437 points | 288 comments)
14. Security researchers identify new malware targeting Linux (97 points | 34 comments)
15. Pidgin 3.0.0 Experimental 1 Announcement (58 points | 26 comments)
16. Interactive Visual Sorting (74 points | 16 comments)
17. Oppose the Patent-Troll-Friendly Prevail Act (59 points | 5 comments)
18. WhisperNER: Unified Open Named Entity and Speech Recognition (72 points | 7 comments)
19. The meme-ification of the "Demon Core" (293 points | 215 comments)
20. Broadcastarr: Stream web content through your Jellyfin instance (54 points | 29 comments)
21. OK, I can partly explain the LLM chess weirdness now (159 points | 133 comments)
22. The Tao of Topic Maps (2000) (4 points | 1 comment)
23. Machiavelli and the Emergence of the Private Study (34 points | 7 comments)
24. Software-defined (Internet) radio with Liquidsoap (2023) (23 points | 2 comments)
25. Growing Music: musical interpretations of L-Systems (2023) [pdf] (5 points | 2 comments)
26. Tailwind CSS v4.0 Beta 1 (125 points | 57 comments)
27. Fun with Logitech MX900 Bluetooth receivers (2006) (8 points | discuss)
28. Listen to the whispers: web timing attacks that work (139 points | 17 comments)
29. Fear, Friendship and the Channel Tunnel (11 points | 1 comment)
30. Emacs Code Conversion Language (94 points | 13 comments)
